info.title: Filming Ruckus
info.description:
This was the first music video we filmed for RYNO. The storyline was... a girls car breaks down outside a 'creepy' warehouse and a gang of hooligans (us) chase her into the warehouse where we terrorize her. Right when Mark, the vocalist, is about to bash her head in with a bat he wakes up with her asleep on his chest...it was all a weird dream...DUN DUN DUUUUUUUUN!

You can watch the video here.
